trans-unit.target: Configuring a Web Application Firewall (WAF) for App Service Environment

trans-unit.source: Learn how to configure a web application firewall in front of your App Service Environment.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to configure a web application firewall in front of your App Service Environment.

trans-unit.source: Configuring a Web Application Firewall (WAF) for App Service Environment
trans-unit.target: Configuring a Web Application Firewall (WAF) for App Service Environment

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: Web application firewalls like the [Barracuda WAF for Azure](https://www.barracuda.com/programs/azure) that is available on the [Azure Marketplace](http://azure.microsoft.com/marketplace/partners/barracudanetworks/waf-byol/) helps secure your web applications by inspecting inbound web traffic to block SQL injections, Cross-Site Scripting, malware uploads & application DDoS and other attacks.
trans-unit.target: Web application firewalls like the [Barracuda WAF for Azure](https://www.barracuda.com/programs/azure) that is available on the [Azure Marketplace](http://azure.microsoft.com/marketplace/partners/barracudanetworks/waf-byol/) helps secure your web applications by inspecting inbound web traffic to block SQL injections, Cross-Site Scripting, malware uploads & application DDoS and other attacks.

trans-unit.source: It also inspects the responses from the back-end web servers for Data Loss Prevention (DLP).
trans-unit.target: It also inspects the responses from the back-end web servers for Data Loss Prevention (DLP).

trans-unit.source: Combined with the isolation and additional scaling provided by App Service Environments, this provides an ideal environment to host business critical web applications that need to withstand malicious requests and high volume traffic.
trans-unit.target: Combined with the isolation and additional scaling provided by App Service Environments, this provides an ideal environment to host business critical web applications that need to withstand malicious requests and high volume traffic.

trans-unit.source: Setup
trans-unit.target: Setup

trans-unit.source: For this document we will configure our App Service Environment behind multiple load balanced instances of Barracuda WAF so that only traffic from the WAF can reach the App Service Environment and it will not be accessible from the DMZ.
trans-unit.target: For this document we will configure our App Service Environment behind multiple load balanced instances of Barracuda WAF so that only traffic from the WAF can reach the App Service Environment and it will not be accessible from the DMZ.

trans-unit.source: We will also have Azure Traffic Manager in front of our Barracuda WAF instances to load balance across Azure data centers and regions.
trans-unit.target: We will also have Azure Traffic Manager in front of our Barracuda WAF instances to load balance across Azure data centers and regions.

trans-unit.source: Configuring your Barracuda WAF Cloud Service
trans-unit.target: Configuring your Barracuda WAF Cloud Service

trans-unit.source: Barracuda has a [detailed article](https://techlib.barracuda.com/WAF/AzureDeploy) on deploying its WAF on a virtual machine in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Barracuda has a [detailed article](https://techlib.barracuda.com/WAF/AzureDeploy) on deploying its WAF on a virtual machine in Azure.

trans-unit.source: But because we want redundancy and not introduce a single point of failure, you want to deploy at least 2 WAF instance VMs into the same Cloud Service when following these instructions.
trans-unit.target: But because we want redundancy and not introduce a single point of failure, you want to deploy at least 2 WAF instance VMs into the same Cloud Service when following these instructions.
